PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06382021-06-24,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  FIN,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectVancouver Fraser Port Authority's borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder approving the Supplementary Letters Patent provision amending Article 9 of the Letters Patent issued to the VANCOUVER FRASER PORT AUTHORITY (VFPA) to increase the limit on the power of the VFPA to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $510M to $1.03B in order to allow it to further develop its strategic infrastructure and to bring its borrowing limit to a level on par with its current financial capacity.
AttachmentsAttachment
